entities.name: SYSTRAN SAS
entities.description: A company operating 'beyond language', as indicated by its tagline.

entities.name: Charte Informatique
entities.description: An IT Charter document outlining company policies regarding information technology.
Release of version 11 of the SYSTRAN IT Charter.

entities.name: Personal IT Usage
entities.description: Guidelines for personal use of IT resources within the company.

entities.name: IT Security
entities.description: Management and implementation of IT security measures and policies.

entities.name: Professional Mobile Phone Usage
entities.description: Guidelines and policies for the use of professional mobile phones by employees.

entities.name: IT System Monitoring
entities.description: Policies regarding the monitoring of the IT system, including its purpose and monitored elements.

entities.name: Sanctions
entities.description: Policies regarding the application of sanctions for IT policy violations.

entities.name: IT Fraud Prevention
entities.description: Measures and legal reminders concerning IT fraud.

entities.name: Copyright Compliance
entities.description: Adherence to copyright law, including legal reminders.

entities.name: Employee Information
entities.description: Procedures for informing employees about IT policies and related matters.

entities.name: Charter Entry into Force
entities.description: Date and conditions for the IT Charter's effectiveness.
